org.apache.flex.swf.io

Interface ISWFWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SizeReportWritingSWFWriter, SWFWriter

    public interface ISWFWriter
extends Closeable
    Serialize an ISWF object to bytes.
